SysSocketBase::LingerSetting

SysSocketBase::LingerSetting Struct Reference

#include <Apoxi/Socket/Sys/SysSocketBase.hpp>


Data Fields

BOOLEAN m_on_off
INT32 m_timeout

Detailed Description

The LingerSetting structure maintains information about a specific socket that specifies how that socket should behave when data is queued to be sent and the socket is closed.

Field Documentation

BOOLEAN SysSocketBase::LingerSetting::m_on_off
 

Specifies whether a socket should remain open for a specified amount of time after the socket is closed to enable queued data to be sent.

INT32 SysSocketBase::LingerSetting::m_timeout
 

Desired time-out (in seconds).
